enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve comparing or hashing the state of the Option object, which can be used to set up consistent test scenarios.
The equals method compares the option and longOption fields, which can be set up using getOpt and getLongOpt methods.
Setting the option field using setOpt can be necessary to test the equals method's behavior with different option values.
Setting the longOption field using setLongOpt can be necessary to test the equals method's behavior with different long option values.
